song.title: Strolling at 4AM CIT
song.info:
when the deepest night is almost gone, and you feel that you ought to breathe some cold air, take a little walk outside in the dark night, breathe the cold air and enjoy the chords in your mind. free yourself...
this track's compo version made 3rd place at mekka 2001's slow motion compo.
NOTE: this version of the track is the original version. there's also a short compo version in the party site.
